title: SC EP:20 Finding Sasquatch Tracks
itunes:title: SC EP:20 Finding Sasquatch Tracks
description: Tonight we talk with a witness who had a roadside crossing sightning and found tracks in the snow. We will also be discussing another bigfoot encounter that appears the government tried to coverup. Join us every Sunday night at 5pm PST as we discuss recent Sasquatch sightings, encounters and talk to Bigfoot eye witnesses. People are seeing something in the woods and there are too many reports for this too be ignored. Listen as we talk to researchers, witnesses and investigators to unravel the mystery of Bigfoot. Every week we will also bring you the latest Bigfoot news and information.
